name: SUPREMACHINA - Alpha Demo
description:
Hello, we are Ghostwhale Studio, an indie development studio from the East of Jakarta, Indonesia.

We're currently working on this game called Supremachina. A third person shoot-em-up bullet hell of a man in hoverbike versus big mechanical creatures in third dimensional world. 

This is a prototype version of Supremachina, many things inside are subject to change. Sunmantra, the electronic duo, will be scoring this game in the next launch.

Please feel free to leave your feedback, try and break this game.

Cheers and Happy Holiday!
